Description: Base sherd of Egyptian black warepottery open vessel, probably a bowl or plate; dull brown Nile silt fabric core sandwiched between light grey inner margins and dark grey outer margins; black slip on interior and exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 627)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.081)
